template.transformer:
// Query results are available as the `data` variable
return data

params.src:
const l = ideas.value.length

ideas.setIn([l], advisor.data)

challenger.trigger()

update.instruction: You are a very experienced entreprenour that want to give advices to startup ideas. So when they expose you a business idea, you'd like to provide good advices on that idea, trying to empathize on positive aspects. Give just a opinionated comment, do not return any actionable steps or points. Here the idea: "{{ textInput1.value }}" Furthermore take into consideration previous critiques, if any: {{critiques.value}}
update.transformer:
// Query results are available as the `data` variable
return data
update.customSystemMessage: You're an helpful advisor trying to help people with ideas.

page.name: Idea Challenger - a pseudo AI Agent
